dcterms:creator: A. Suhr
M. Lewis
J. Yeh
Y. Artzi
dcterms:description: NLVR is a dataset of blocks world domain that requires complex reasoning abilities. The world is given structured representations of various objects and the utterance is a statement about the properties or relations of the objects. The denotations are Boolean values representing whether the given utterance is true or false in the world.
dcterms:title: Natural Language Visual Reasoning (NLVR)

dcterms:creator: P. Pasupat
P. Liang
dcterms:description: WTQ is a table semantic parsing dataset with complex queries and large natural language variation. Worlds are structured representations of Wikipedia tables and utterances are questions about the tables. Denotations can have values in the table cells or values obtained by applying some elementary functions to the cell values.
dcterms:title: WIKITABLEQUESTIONS (WTQ)
